typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		{Type of event} as string,
		Email as string,
		{Phone number} as string,
		{Registration Date} as string,
		{Submission Date} as string,
		{Last name} as string,
		{Middle name} as string,
		{First name} as string,
		Gender as string,
		{Year of birth} as string,
		{Date of birth} as string,
		Country as string,
		{Organization/ Company name} as string,
		{Job title} as string,
		{Professional status} as string,
		{Type of entity} as string,
		{Sub-type of entity} as string,
		Size as string,
		{BSO ownership} as string,
		{Office Address} as string,
		City as string,
		{Post Code} as string,
		Website as string,
		Twitter as string,
		LinkedIn as string,
		{Date of birth2} as string,
		{Country of Residence} as string,
		Nationality as string,
		Address as string,
		Cityname as string,
		Region as string,
		{Type of tool} as string,
		{Area of change} as string,
		{Service themes} as string,
		{Date of data collection} as string,
		id as string,
		Course_name as string,
		Username as string,
		Title as string,
		idnumber as string,
		Functional_title as string,
		Howlong as string,
		Priorexperience as string,
		{Country code} as string,
		Pobox as string,
		Postalcode as string,
		Skype as string,
		Aim as string,
		Yahoo as string,
		Msn as string,
		Profile_field_Supervisor as string,
		{Service theme} as string,
		Cityregion as string,
		Certification_date as string,
		Certified as string,
		Cohort as string,
		Uniqueid as string,
		User_id as string,
		Enrol_time as string,
		{Type of platform} as string,
		{SheTrades Project} as string,
		ISIC as string,
		{Please select the area of your activity} as string,
		HS as string,
		{Owner/ top manager gender} as string,
		{Owner/ top manager age} as string,
		{Type of training} as string,
		{Service theme 1} as string,
		{Service theme 2} as string,
		Location as string,
		{Name of the entity} as string,
		{ISIC code division} as string,
		{HS 6 digit code (if available)} as string,
		{Account Name} as string,
		{English Name} as string,
		Acronym as string,
		{Account Type} as string,
		{Account Sub-Type} as string,
		{Office Address: Country} as string,
		Category as string,
		{Parent Account} as string,
		Confidential as string,
		Activity as string,
		Product as string,
		{Women Managed} as string,
		{Youth Managed} as string,
		{Social media} as string,
		{Other emails} as string,
		{Other phone numbers} as string,
		{Other information} as string,
		{Ownership and management} as string,
		{Trade Forum} as string,
		{Office Address: Street 1} as string,
		{Office Address: Street 2} as string,
		{Office Address: City} as string,
		{Office Address: State/Province} as string,
		{Office Address: ZIP/Postal Code} as string,
		{Mailing address is equal to office address} as string,
		{Mailing Address: Street 1} as string,
		{Mailing Address: Street 2} as string,
		{Mailing Address: City} as string,
		{Mailing Address: State/Province} as string,
		{Mailing Address: ZIP/Postal Code} as string,
		{Mailing Address: Country} as string,
		{UN Mailing Format} as string,
		{Project Number} as string,
		Salutation as string,
		Account as string,
		Phone as string,
		{Preferred Language} as string,
		{Use account address} as string,
		{Event title} as string,
		{Event type} as string,
		{Course name} as string,
		{Start date} as string,
		{End date} as string,
		{Event date} as string,
		{SME Trade Academy} as string,
		SheTrades as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 1000) ~> srcALL
srcALL filter({Professional status}!='Self-employed/ freelancer') ~> FilterProfessionalStatus
FilterProfessionalStatus select(mapColumn(
		Email,
		{Phone number},
		{Organization/ Company name},
		{Professional status},
		{BSO ownership},
		{Office Address},
		City,
		{Post Code},
		Website,
		Twitter,
		LinkedIn,
		Address,
		Cityname,
		Region,
		Postalcode,
		Cityregion,
		{Name of the entity},
		{Account Name},
		{Office Address: Country},
		Category,
		Confidential,
		{Social media},
		{Other emails},
		{Other phone numbers},
		{Other information},
		{Office Address: Street 1},
		{Office Address: Street 2},
		{Office Address: City},
		{Office Address: State/Province},
		{Office Address: ZIP/Postal Code},
		{Mailing Address: Street 1},
		{Mailing Address: Street 2},
		{Mailing Address: City},
		{Mailing Address: State/Province},
		{Mailing Address: ZIP/Postal Code},
		{Mailing Address: Country},
		{UN Mailing Format},
		Account,
		Phone,
		FILE_NAME,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectReqCol
SelectReqCol derive(ENTITY_NAME = case(isNull({Organization/ Company name})==false(),
     {Organization/ Company name},
     isNull({Name of the entity})==false(),
     {Name of the entity},
     isNull(Account)==false(),
     Account,
     isNull({Account Name})==false(),
     {Account},
     ''),
		ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME = substring(Email, instr(Email, '@')+1),
		ADDRESS = case(isNull(Address)==false(),
     Address,
     isNull({Office Address})==false(),
     {Office Address},
     isNull({Office Address: Street 1})==false(),
     {Office Address: Street 1},
     ''),
		CITY = case(isNull(City)==false(),
     City,
     isNull(Cityname)==false(),
     Cityname,
     isNull({Office Address: City})==false(),
     {Office Address: City},
     ''),
		REGION = Region,
		{PHONE NUMBER} = {Phone number},
		WEBSITE = Website,
		TWITTER = Twitter,
		LINKEDIN = LinkedIn,
		SOURCE = FILE_NAME,
		BSO_OWNERSHIP = {BSO ownership},
		POST_CODE = case(isNull({Post Code})==false(),
     {Post Code},
     isNull(Postalcode)==false(),
     Postalcode,
     isNull({Office Address: ZIP/Postal Code})==false(),
     {Office Address: ZIP/Postal Code},
     ''),
		POBOX = {Office Address: Street 2},
		CITY_REGION = case(isNull(Cityregion)==false(),
     Cityregion,
     isNull({Office Address: State/Province})==false(),
     {Office Address: State/Province},
     ''),
		CATEGORY = Category,
		CONFIDENTIAL = Confidential,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA = {Social media},
		OTHER_EMAILS = {Other emails},
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS = {Other phone numbers},
		OTHER_INFORMATION = {Other information},
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET1 = {Mailing Address: Street 1},
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET2 = {Mailing Address: Street 2},
		MAILING_ADDRESS_CITY = {Mailing Address: City},
		MAILING_STATE_PROVICE = {Mailing Address: State/Province},
		MAILING_POST_CODE = {Mailing Address: ZIP/Postal Code},
		MAILING_COUNTRY = {Mailing Address: Country},
		MAILING_FORMAT_UN = {UN Mailing Format}) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		FILE_NAME,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP,
		ENTITY_NAME,
		ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME,
		ADDRESS = DerivedColumn1@ADDRESS,
		CITY = DerivedColumn1@CITY,
		REGION = DerivedColumn1@REGION,
		{PHONE NUMBER} = DerivedColumn1@{PHONE NUMBER},
		WEBSITE = DerivedColumn1@WEBSITE,
		TWITTER = DerivedColumn1@TWITTER,
		LINKEDIN = DerivedColumn1@LINKEDIN,
		SOURCE,
		BSO_OWNERSHIP,
		POST_CODE,
		POBOX,
		CITY_REGION,
		CATEGORY = DerivedColumn1@CATEGORY,
		CONFIDENTIAL = DerivedColumn1@CONFIDENTIAL,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA,
		OTHER_EMAILS,
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS,
		OTHER_INFORMATION,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET1,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET2,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_CITY,
		MAILING_STATE_PROVICE,
		MAILING_POST_CODE,
		MAILING_COUNTRY,
		MAILING_FORMAT_UN
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDIM
